messages.title: Ready To WIN!
messages.content: Bob Barr and Jo Crotty are set to Win in Lymm on May 6th.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Proud of the tenats for voting overwhelmingly for the transfer of their homes to a new Trust. This will allow over £100 million to be invested on improvements to homes in the next five years.
Lymm Dam was awarded one of six Green Flags awarded by the Council. Working on improving our environment, protecting the Green Belt and taking a lead on tackling climate change.
Praised as one of the big successess of the Lib Dem lead Council at Warrington is the massive increase in recycling rates.

issues.environment: Working on improving our environment, protecting the Green Belt and taking a lead on tackling climate change.

housing.content: Proud of the tenats for voting overwhelmingly for the transfer of their homes to a new Trust. This will allow over £100 million to be invested on improvements to homes in the next five years.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jo Crotty and Bob Barr work hard for Lymm and keep you informed through regular FOCUS newsletters. Bob is an experienced councillor and we urge you to re-elect him onto Warrington Council.

politicalExperience.achievements: Work on improving our environment, recycling, and housing.

images.caption: Jo Crotty and Bob Barr with the Liberal Democrats Focus banner and election messages.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Jo Crotty is featured alongside Bob Barr who is running for local councillor. They emphasize their work for Lymm, improvements in the area, and the call for re-election of Bob Barr.
